data.name: NARAKA BLADEPOINT - Ultimate DLC
data.detailed_description:
ULTIMATE DLC

*To get your digital artwork and soundtrack, navigate to SteamLibrary/steamapps/common/NARAKA BLADEPOINT/ArtworksAndSoundtrack and download the content.*


About the Game

Upgrade your game to earn ULTIMATE rewards


The ULTIMATE DLC contains:

- Matari Exclusive Outfit

- Exclusive Grappling Hook

- Digital Soundtrack

- Digital Art Booklet

*To get your digital artwork and soundtrack, navigate to SteamLibrary/steamapps/common/NARAKA BLADEPOINT/ArtworksAndSoundtrack and download the content.*

*Note: Exclusive items can not be purchased in the game
data.about_the_game:
Upgrade your game to earn ULTIMATE rewards


The ULTIMATE DLC contains:

- Matari Exclusive Outfit

- Exclusive Grappling Hook

- Digital Soundtrack

- Digital Art Booklet

*To get your digital artwork and soundtrack, navigate to SteamLibrary/steamapps/common/NARAKA BLADEPOINT/ArtworksAndSoundtrack and download the content.*

*Note: Exclusive items can not be purchased in the game
data.short_description: Experience the Unchained Multiplayer Combat with NARAKA: BLADEPOINT ULTIMATE EDITION, including Matari exclusive outfit, exclusive Grappling Hook, Digital Soundtrack and Art Booklet.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese, Thai, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 4th generation or AMD FX 6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750TI or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: a) Can run at 720p/60fps; b) We advise you install the game on an SSD for a more streamlined experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 7th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6G or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: a) Can run at 1080p/60fps; b) We advise you install the game on an SSD for a more streamlined experience.
